title: Citi releases third quarter 2011 earnings.
summary: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the third quarter of 2011. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video.
tag-2: Earlier this morning, Citi released its earnings report for the third quarter of 2011. Chief Financial Officer John Gerspach discusses the report in this video.
tag-3: For more information and the full earnings report, visit the Investor Relations section of Citigroup's website.
